column2: The name of the Indian state or territory where the energy data is recorded.
column3: The calendar year of the recorded data.
column4: The specific source of renewable energy (e.g., Wind, Solar, Bio-Power).
column5: Total electricity generated during the year in Million Units (MU).
column6: The total installed power generation capacity in Mega Watts (MW).
column7: The estimated maximum energy generation potential of the region in Mega Watts (MW).
column8: The average power generated, calculated from total generation.
column9: Capacity Utilization Factor. The ratio of actual output to maximum possible output (Efficiency metric).
column10: The difference between the estimated Potential and actual Installed Capacity ($Potential - Capacity$).
column11: The percentage of the total potential that is currently being utilized.
